timeline.bodyText:
Modifying a given argument is a bad practice due to the function is not pure that reduces testability. It would be better if you create the itemList inside elemToList() or return an element from the method and add it in the caller.
Also, SonarCloud will show a code smell that the returned value is ignored.
timeline.author: temanbrcom

replies.bodyText: I want also say that pass null as function argument is a bad practice until is not strictly required (and in case should be explained the reason)
